Text:
Welcome bonzo!  Thought I lost this 'gem', but it was just on one of my old HD's.  Far as I know only the VHS copy exists...

Enjoy!
Like going back in time; thanks so much..

Wikipedia: On January 25, 2008, the series was released in Germany as a five-disc DVD box set (Region 2) with all episodes (including the final episode, which was originally unaired on NBC but broadcast in Germany) with both English and German soundtracks and German subtitles.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misfits_of_Science#DVD_releases

Anyone from Germany got the DVD set? ;)
